component.name: org.nuxeo.ecm.core.jms.CoreEventPublisher
component.documentation:
The jms publisher for core events
@author Bogdan Stefanescu

extension.documentation:
Core event listener contributions that deals with forwarding Nuxeo core events on a JMS dedicated topic using the JMSMessageProducerService.
Order is 499 so that it is notified after most of listeners. and before the deprecated jmsListener
